title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 40.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 40.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to prescribe the terms and conditions under which certain group annuity contracts and funding agreements may be delivered or issued for delivery in the State of New York. This Part provides disclosure requirements, rules for contract withdrawals to pay certain defined contribution plan benefits and rules relating to contract terminations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11

40.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
